Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Affinities appear above a card's name.
Affinity.NAME: Affinity

After Image.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] whenever you play a card.
After Image.NAME: After Image

Afterlife.DESCRIPTION: Cards in #yAfterlife may be played by #yPurging any number of different cards from your hand or #yExhaust pile that collectively have all of its [A-Gen]. This does not use [E].
Afterlife.NAME: Afterlife

Augment.DESCRIPTION: #yAugments modify the effect or properties of the card they are slotted into.
Augment.NAME: Augment

Autoplay.DESCRIPTION: Automatically played when in hand. Still uses [E].
Autoplay.NAME: Autoplay

Blinded.DESCRIPTION: Deal #b1 less #yAttack damage per stack. Reduced by #b1 at turn end.
Blinded.NAME: Blinded

Blue Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Affinities appear above a card's name.
Blue Affinity.NAME: Blue Affinity

Bounce.DESCRIPTION: Returns to your hand when played.
Bounce.NAME: Bounce

Bruised.DESCRIPTION: Take #b1 more damage per stack from #yAttacks. Reduced by #b1 at turn start.
Bruised.NAME: Bruised

Brutal Damage.DESCRIPTION: Affected twice by powers that modify damage.
Brutal Damage.NAME: Brutal Damage

Buffer.DESCRIPTION: Negate the next HP loss you receive, then reduce stacks by #b1.
Buffer.NAME: Buffer

Chance.DESCRIPTION: Activate an effect with a certain probability.
Chance.NAME: Chance

Choked.DESCRIPTION: Lose HP whenever a card is played.
Choked.NAME: Choked

Confused.DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of cards drawn.
Confused.NAME: Confused

Constricted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of each turn.
Constricted.NAME: Constricted

Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Executes after a certain number of uses.
Cooldown.NAME: Cooldown

Corpse Explosion.DESCRIPTION: On death, deals damage to all enemies based on its Max HP.
Corpse Explosion.NAME: Corpse Explosion

Counter.DESCRIPTION: Card property used for custom card effects.
Counter.NAME: Counter

Create.DESCRIPTION: Add a new card in the specified pile.
Create.NAME: Create

Critical.DESCRIPTION: The next #yAttack played deals #b+{0}% damage per stack.
Critical.NAME: Critical

Curl Up.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] when you receive unblocked attack damage, then remove this power.
Curl Up.NAME: Curl Up

Cycle.DESCRIPTION: Discard a certain number of cards then draw that many cards.
Cycle.NAME: Cycle

Deflection.DESCRIPTION: Reflect blocked #yAttack damage back at the attacker.
Deflection.NAME: Deflection

Delayed.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card at the bottom of your deck.
Delayed.NAME: Delayed

Delayed Damage.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of your turn. Only enemies can die from this damage.
Delayed Damage.NAME: Delayed Damage

Draw Minus.DESCRIPTION: Draw fewer cards at the start of next turn.
Draw Minus.NAME: Draw Minus

Draw Plus.DESCRIPTION: Draw additional cards at the start of next turn.
Draw Plus.NAME: Draw Plus

Duplication.DESCRIPTION: The next card played is played an additional time.
Duplication.NAME: Duplication

Energized.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of next turn.
Energized.NAME: Energized

Escape.DESCRIPTION: Skip the current battle. Receive no rewards.
Escape.NAME: Escape

Entangled.DESCRIPTION: You may not play any Attacks this turn.
Entangled.NAME: Entangled

Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply [Poison].
Envenom.NAME: Envenom

Ephemeral.DESCRIPTION: Purges at the end of turn or when played.
Ephemeral.NAME: Ephemeral

Fleeting.DESCRIPTION: When used, remove this card from play and your deck.
Fleeting.NAME: Fleeting

Flight.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less #yAttack damage. Reduced after taking #yAttack damage. Restored at the start of turn if it wasn't reduced to #b0.
Flight.NAME: Flight

Foresight.DESCRIPTION: Scry at the start of your turn.
Foresight.NAME: Foresight

Fragile.DESCRIPTION: Exhausts if you play another card while this is in hand.
Fragile.NAME: Fragile

Grave.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.
Grave.NAME: Grave

Green Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Affinities appear above a card's name.
Green Affinity.NAME: Green Affinity

HP.DESCRIPTION: A creature dies when it runs out of HP.
HP.NAME: HP

Immaterial Damage.DESCRIPTION: Affected by #yPowers modifying #yOrb output. Ignores #yPowers that modify #yAttack damage or activate on contact.
Immaterial Damage.NAME: Immaterial Damage

Impaired.DESCRIPTION: Reduces the effectiveness of your Orbs by #b{0}%.
Impaired.NAME: Impaired

Innovation.DESCRIPTION: Ignore the costs of the next #yInteractable Power used.
Innovation.NAME: Innovation

Interactable.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn (unless specified otherwise), activate this effect by clicking this item and paying its cost.
Interactable.NAME: Interactable

Invincible.DESCRIPTION: Limits the amount of HP that can be lost each turn.
Invincible.NAME: Invincible

Juggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain [Block], deal damage to a random enemy.
Juggernaut.NAME: Juggernaut

Level.DESCRIPTION: The #yLevel of an #yAffinity increases its effect on cards and game mechanics that rely on them.
Level.NAME: Level

Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per combat, across all copies of this card.
Limited.NAME: Limited

Loyal.DESCRIPTION: If this would enter your discard pile, move it to your draw pile instead.
Loyal.NAME: Loyal

Malleable.DESCRIPTION: Upon receiving damage, gain [Block], then increase this power by #b1. Resets at the start of turn.
Malleable.NAME: Malleable

Mark.DESCRIPTION: Used by #yPressure #yPoints and custom card effects.
Mark.NAME: Mark

Metallicize.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] at the start of your turn.
Metallicize.NAME: Metallicize

Multiform.DESCRIPTION: You may change this card's form in the pop-up viewer from your master deck outside of combat.
Multiform.NAME: Multiform

Next Turn Block.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] at the start of next turn.
Next Turn Block.NAME: Next Turn Block

No Block.DESCRIPTION: Nullify all [Block] gained from cards this turn.
No Block.NAME: No Block

No Draw.DESCRIPTION: You cannot draw cards this turn.
No Draw.NAME: No Draw

Normal Damage.DESCRIPTION: Affected by powers activating on contact.
Normal Damage.NAME: Normal Damage

Noxious Fumes.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, apply [Poison] to ALL enemies.
Noxious Fumes.NAME: Noxious Fumes

Obtain.DESCRIPTION: Add the specified card to your deck.
Obtain.NAME: Obtain

Orange Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Affinities appear above a card's name.
Orange Affinity.NAME: Orange Affinity

Orb Slot.DESCRIPTION: #yOrb #ySlots allow you to channel additional Orbs.
Orb Slot.NAME: Orb Slot

Pay.DESCRIPTION: Lose the specified entity to activate an effect.
Pay.NAME: Pay

Persist.DESCRIPTION: Only discards after a certain number of uses each turn.
Persist.NAME: Persist

Plated Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] at the end of your turn. Reduced by #b1 when receiving damage.
Plated Armor.NAME: Plated Armor

Provoked.DESCRIPTION: The target takes #b+{0}% damage from #yAttacks, and it must attack this turn.
Provoked.NAME: Provoked

Purple Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Affinities appear above a card's name.
Purple Affinity.NAME: Purple Affinity

Rebound.DESCRIPTION: Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.
Rebound.NAME: Rebound

Recast.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, play a copy of this card. The copy #yPurges and does not #yRecast.
Recast.NAME: Recast

Red Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Affinities appear above a card's name.
Red Affinity.NAME: Red Affinity

Regeneration.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP at the end of the turn. Reduce by 1 each turn.
Regeneration.NAME: Regeneration

Remove.DESCRIPTION: Remove the specified card from your deck.
Remove.NAME: Remove

Reshuffle.DESCRIPTION: Reshuffling moves cards to your draw pile.
Reshuffle.NAME: Reshuffle

Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: If you would die, set your HP to this power's stacks and remove this power.
Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary

Scout.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards, then move the same number of cards to the top of your draw pile.
Scout.NAME: Scout

Select.DESCRIPTION: Perform an action on a card of your choice.
Select.NAME: Select

Self-Immolation.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card with [Block], ALL characters take damage at the end of their turns equal to its [Block] times this power's stacks.
Self-Immolation.NAME: Self-Immolation

Semi-Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per turn, across all copies of this card.
Semi-Limited.NAME: Semi-Limited

Silenced.DESCRIPTION: Negate incoming buffs. Does not affect powers specific to cards or monsters.
Silenced.NAME: Silenced

Silver Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Affinities appear above a card's name.
Silver Affinity.NAME: Silver Affinity

Slow.DESCRIPTION: For every card you have played this turn, take #b10% more damage from #yAttacks.
Slow.NAME: Slow

Sorcery.DESCRIPTION: Increase the potency of the next Orb Channeled. Also increases [Immaterial Damage] dealt while active.
Sorcery.NAME: Sorcery

Soulbound.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be removed from your deck.
Soulbound.NAME: Soulbound

Spread.DESCRIPTION: Spread a target's power to its allies.
Spread.NAME: Spread

Stabilize.DESCRIPTION: Prevent a turn-based power from being reduced at the start of turn.
Stabilize.NAME: Stabilize

Starter.DESCRIPTION: Activates if played at the start of turn.
Starter.NAME: Starter

Startup.DESCRIPTION: Play this effect at the start of combat.
Startup.NAME: Startup

Steal.DESCRIPTION: Move items from the target to yourself.
Steal.NAME: Steal

Summon.DESCRIPTION: #ySummon cards act every turn and intercept unblocked damage.
Summon.NAME: Summon

Supercharged.DESCRIPTION: Gain additional [E] at the start of each turn.
Supercharged.NAME: Supercharged

Suspensive.DESCRIPTION: This card may be played with next turn's [E].
Suspensive.NAME: Suspensive

Temporary HP.DESCRIPTION: Temporary HP lasts until end of combat.
Temporary HP.NAME: Temporary HP

Thousand Cuts.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies whenever you play a card.
Thousand Cuts.NAME: Thousand Cuts

Timing.DESCRIPTION: Determines whether a card or effect triggers before or after your turn.
Timing.NAME: Timing

Toxicology.DESCRIPTION: Apply additional stacks of stack-based debuffs.
Toxicology.NAME: Toxicology

Trigger.DESCRIPTION: Activate the passive effect of an #yOrb or #ySummon.
Trigger.NAME: Trigger

Turn End Timing.DESCRIPTION: Acts at the end of your turn. Does not act on the turn it is #ySummoned.
Turn End Timing.NAME: Turn End Timing

Turn Start Timing.DESCRIPTION: Acts at the start of your turn.
Turn Start Timing.NAME: Turn Start Timing

Unique.DESCRIPTION: Can be #yUpgraded any number of times. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck. Additional copies will #yUpgrade this card instead.
Unique.NAME: Unique

Unknown Affinity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of battle, this #yAffinity becomes another random #yAffinity.
Unknown Affinity.NAME: Unknown Affinity

Vigor.DESCRIPTION: The next Attack played deals additional damage per hit.
Vigor.NAME: Vigor

Vitality.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain [Temporary HP].
Vitality.NAME: Vitality

Withdraw.DESCRIPTION: #yWithdrawing a #ySummon #yTriggers it twice and returns it to your discard pile.
Withdraw.NAME: Withdraw

Yellow Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Affinities appear above a card's name.
Yellow Affinity.NAME: Yellow Affinity
